message: Hurry and Register, I will present the on April 10, in the MVP Webinar - Live Webcast "Load Balancing Exchange 2010 in the real world" (Middle East), learn the secrets of load balancing in Exchange 2010, how to use LoadMaster to loadbalance Exchange traffic, tips and tricks from the field all in ARABIC for the first time, space is limited, so hurry and book your calendar.
story: Mahmoud Magdy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: MVP Webinar -  Live Webcast "Load Balancing Exchange 2010 in the real world" (Middle East)
caption: www3.gotomeeting.com
description: KEMP Technologies proudly presents an exclusive MVP live webcast about load balancing Exchange 2010 in the real world.     Learn the latest from Microsoft Exchange MVP Mahmoud Madgy, who will speak about the actual steps of planning and deploying the LoadMaster for Microsoft Exchange 2010.
